scripts.dev:ngrok-hint: echo "1) ngrok http 8081; 2) ngrok http 3000; 3) VITE_VOICE_GATEWAY_URL=wss://<gw-url>/ws/voice npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
scripts.dev:vp: concurrently -k -n gateway,tunnel,web "cd voice-gateway && npm start" "cloudflared tunnel --url http://localhost:8081" "npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
scripts.dev:stack:local: concurrently -k -n emu,gw,web "firebase emulators:start --only firestore,auth --project cardioquest-live-test" "cd voice-gateway && ALLOW_INSECURE_VOICE_WS=true npm run build && ALLOW_INSECURE_VOICE_WS=true npm start" "npm run dev -- --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5173 --strictPort --clearScreen false"
scripts.dev:tunnel: concurrently -k -n tunnel,gw,web "cloudflared tunnel run virtual-patient" "cd voice-gateway && ALLOW_INSECURE_VOICE_WS=true npm run dev" "VITE_USE_EMULATORS=false VITE_VOICE_GATEWAY_URL=wss://voice.cardioquestlive.com/ws/voice npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
scripts.test:rules: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore --project cardioquest-live-test "npm test -- --runInBand test/firestore.rules.test.ts"
scripts.test:rules:ports: node scripts/gen-emu-config.cjs && firebase emulators:exec --config .firebase.emu.generated.json --only firestore --project cardioquest-live-test "npm test -- --runInBand test/firestore.rules.test.ts"
